dmca.title: [ABUSE] ::Illegal Duplication Of Teambutkus.com Site By Monstermassage.com::]
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal.
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

-----Original Message-----
From: abuseadm@theplanet.com [mailto:abuseadm@theplanet.com] On Behalf
Of Policy Enforcement
Posted At: Friday, April 28, 2006 6:55 AM
Posted To: Copyright
Conversation: [Fwd: [ABUSE] ::Illegal Duplication Of Teambutkus.com Site
By Monstermassage.com::]
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] ::Illegal Duplication Of Teambutkus.com Site By
Monstermassage.com::]


-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----

For your review.

Thank you,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/

- -------- Original Message --------

with esmtp (Exim) id 1FZJpP-0004Cf-GS; Thu, 27 Apr 2006 22:39:35 -0500

helo=mx01.filter.theplanet.com) by mail.theplanet.com (envelope-from
dcook@teambutkus.com) with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) (Exim)
id 1FZJpO-0004CS-2X for abuse@theplanet.com; Thu, 27 Apr 2006 22:39:34
-0500

esmtp (Exim) id 1FZJpM-000Q00-Eh for abuse@theplanet.com; Thu, 27 Apr
2006 22:39:33 -0500
Received:         from [68.5.181.118] by fed1rmmtao06.cox.net (InterMail
vM.6.01.06.01 201-2131-130-101-20060113) with ESMTP id
<20060428033929.KIOC21197.fed1rmmtao06.cox.net@[68.5.181.118]> for
<abuse@theplanet.com>; Thu, 27 Apr 2006 23:39:29 -0400
User-Agent:         Microsoft-Entourage/11.1.0.040913

neither
permitted nor denied by domain of teambutkus.com)

helo=fed1rmmtao06.cox.net;
X-Spam-Level:         ---------------------------------------------------
X-Spam-Score:         -102.6
Subject:         [ABUSE] ::Illegal Duplication Of Teambutkus.com Site By
Monstermassage.com::
X-BeenThere:         abuse@lists.theplanet.com
X-Mailman-Version:         2.1.7
Precedence:         list
List-Id:         <abuse.lists.theplanet.com>
List-Unsubscribe:
<http://lists.theplanet.com/mailman/listinfo/abuse>,
<mailto:abuse-request@lists.theplanet.com?subject=unsubscribe>
List-Post:         <mailto:abuse@lists.theplanet.com>
List-Help:         <mailto:abuse-request@lists.theplanet.com?subject=help>
List-Subscribe:
<http://lists.theplanet.com/mailman/listinfo/abuse>,
<mailto:abuse-request@lists.theplanet.com?subject=subscribe>
Sender:         abuse-bounces@lists.theplanet.com
Errors-To:         abuse-bounces@lists.theplanet.com



The site you host or are registrar for (monstermassage.com) has
illegally duplicated our site (Teambutkus.com) in full and has posted it
to your hosting service. In order to comply with our intellectual
property rights and copyrights, we are requesting the immediate removal
of all contents of this site. Thank you.

David Cook
Team Butkus
www.teambutkus.com
dcook@teambutkus.com
714.389.5323
